title: Understanding Schedule III
text: Schedule III substances are defined by their potential for abuse and dependence. They are considered less dangerous than Schedule I and II substances.

title: Characteristics of Schedule III
text: These substances have a moderate to low potential for physical and psychological dependence. They are less likely to be abused compared to Schedule I and II substances.

hintAnswer: moderate to low potential for physical and psychological dependence
title: Identifying Schedule III Substances
text: Which of the following best describes the potential for abuse and dependence of Schedule III substances?
choices: moderate to low potential for physical and psychological dependence
low potential for abuse and low risk of dependence
lower potential for abuse than Schedule IV and consists of preparations containing limited quantities of certain narcotics
